page.title: 16A DAY CARE GROUP 2
page.content: Mrs.Mitchell is paid so much per hour per child.It is not a great amount of money but it cares for her needs,and means one can buy a few extras aswell. Mrs.Mitchell would still be at home if she didn't run the play group,as she has a young son of her own,and must be around the house to look after him.The Mitchell's have two dogs,but neither goes near or seem to bother the children. About five children attend the group regularly and know Mrs.Mitchell,and the dogs,very well.Therefore they do not mind attending the play group at all. Mrs.Mitchell feels that she enables some families to keep going as without her,young mothers,some of them single_ parents,could not go to work.
